thingsToDo.name: The Panthéon
thingsToDo.description: Neoclassical mausoleum where France's most celebrated figures are buried. Climb the dome for stunning panoramic views of Paris.
thingsToDo.access: Metro Line 10 (Cardinal Lemoine) or RER B (Luxembourg)
thingsToDo.notes: Walking distance from Latin Quarter accommodations

thingsToDo.name: Shakespeare and Company Bookstore
thingsToDo.description: Legendary English-language bookshop frequented by writers and artists since the 1950s.
thingsToDo.access: Walking distance from Latin Quarter, near Seine
thingsToDo.notes: Free to browse, great for photos

thingsToDo.name: Musée de Cluny (National Museum of the Middle Ages)
thingsToDo.description: Medieval art and Roman ruins housed in a former abbey. Don't miss the famous 'Lady and the Unicorn' tapestries.

thingsToDo.name: Arènes de Lutèce
thingsToDo.description: Ancient Roman amphitheater tucked in a quiet corner - a true hidden gem.
thingsToDo.notes: Free to visit, often overlooked by tourists

thingsToDo.name: Rue Mouffetard & Place de la Contrescarpe
thingsToDo.description: Famous for its vibrant daily market and authentic Parisian atmosphere. Perfect for street food, crêpes, and falafel.

thingsToDo.name: Medieval Street Wandering
thingsToDo.location: Rue de la Huchette and Rue Saint-André-des-Arts
thingsToDo.description: Charming, narrow lanes filled with cafés, bakeries, and shops reminiscent of medieval Paris.
thingsToDo.notes: Great for evening strolls and people-watching

thingsToDo.name: Jardin du Luxembourg
thingsToDo.description: Beautiful garden ideal for a rest, people-watching, or a picnic.
thingsToDo.access: Multiple Metro lines to Luxembourg station

events.name: Major Concerts
events.notes: Book tickets early as April concerts often sell out in advance

events.name: Smaller Venue Concerts
events.description: Perfect for discovering rising artists or intimate shows across genres (pop, rock, rap, jazz, world music)

events.name: Classical Music & Opera
events.notes: Book opera tickets well in advance

events.name: Art Exhibitions
events.notes: Purchase tickets online in advance to avoid long lines

events.name: Tuileries Carnival
events.description: Annual spring celebration with open-air events

events.name: 100% Festival at Parc de La Villette
events.description: Multidisciplinary festival featuring music, art, and live performances. Family-friendly with street food and outdoor markets

events.name: Paris Jazz Festival
events.description: Multiple events throughout April across various neighborhoods
events.notes: Over 39 music festival events listed for April 2026

events.name: Versailles Musical Fountain Shows
events.description: Dazzling combination of fountains, music, and gardens

restaurants.name: La Petite Périgourdine
restaurants.atmosphere: Quintessential French bistro near the Panthéon with charming historic interiors

restaurants.name: Le Petit Prince de Paris
specialties: Beautifully presented French fare using fresh ingredients
restaurants.atmosphere: Building dating back to 1450, very atmospheric

restaurants.name: Bistro des Augustins
restaurants.atmosphere: Tiny bistro with chalkboard menu and authentic worn decor

restaurants.name: Tour d'Argent
restaurants.atmosphere: Legendary Michelin-starred restaurant with spectacular views of Notre-Dame
restaurants.notes: Special occasion dining, reservations essential, dress code applies

restaurants.name: Alliance
restaurants.notes: Chef's menu with inventive dishes, reserve well in advance

restaurants.name: L'Atelier Artisan Crêpier Mouffetard
specialties: Sweet crêpes using local, market-sourced ingredients
restaurants.notes: Great for lunch after visiting the market

restaurants.name: Les Papilles
restaurants.atmosphere: Intimate bistro with excellent wine selection
restaurants.notes: Focuses on seasonal produce, very popular with locals

restaurants.name: Le Méchoui du Prince
restaurants.atmosphere: Traditional Moroccan cuisine for over 50 years

restaurants.name: Blueberry Maki Bar
restaurants.location: 6 Rue du Sabot (6th district, near Latin Quarter)
restaurants.atmosphere: Stylish modern spot with exotic flavors
restaurants.notes: Great for a modern social dining experience

transportation.notes: The Latin Quarter is very walkable - most attractions and restaurants are within 15-20 minutes on foot from each other.
